text: Define the connective * for the Boolean variables X and Y as: X*xY=XY+X'Y. Let Z = X % Y. Consider the following expressions P, @ and R. P:X=Y*%Z,Q:Y=X*Z,R:XxY*xZ=1 Which of the following is TRUE? A. Only P and @ are valid. B. Only @ and R are valid. C. Only P and R are valid. D.All P, Q, R are valid. gatecse-2007 digital-logic normal boolean-algebra
